target.name: cleanAll
target.description: Remove the reports/ and doc/jsdoc directories.

target.name: jsdoc
target.description: Run jsdoc to generate documentation for JavaScript files.
target.echo: Invoke jsdoc to generate documentation for .js files. The output appears in doc/jsdoc/index.html

target.name: ptdoc
target.description: Invoke jsdoc to read *.js files and generate *PtDoc.xml files suitable for Ptolemy
target.echo: Invoke jsdoc to read *.js files and generate *PtDoc.xml files suitable for Ptolemy. See https://chess.eecs.berkeley.edu/ptexternal/wiki/Main/JSDocSystems See jsdoc/jsdoc.json See jsdoc/plugins/accessorJSDocTags.js See jsdoc/templates/ptdoc/publish.js

target.name: vendors-jsdoc
target.description: Check out jsdoc using git to create vendors/jsdoc.
target.echo: Clone the git repo. We use an accessor-specific fork of https://github.com/terraswarm/jsdoc.git, made on 12-Jun-2015 so that we can support @accessor, @input, @output, @parameter.

target.name: vendors-jsdoc-pull
target.description: Do a git pull in vendors/jsdoc
